name: Alex Covo
mission: From the raw grit of NYC streets in black and white to ethereal light-painted dreamscapes, Alex Covo photographs fashion as story. Celebrating fashion photography from minimal street realism to high-end editorial, each model becomes a living protagonist—lit with intention and framed like a scene from a film.
bio: New York City–based fashion photographer blending gritty street portraiture with cinematic editorial craft and experimental light-painting techniques. His work centers fashion models as characters and uses light, mood, and movement to create images that feel both grounded and dreamlike.
